snippet: Justin Williams, Jeff Carter and Mike Richards scored in an overwhelming first period, and the Los Angeles Kings advanced to their third straight N.H.L. Western Conference finals with a 6-2 victory over the Anaheim Ducks in Game 7 of their...
lead_paragraph: Justin Williams, Jeff Carter and Mike Richards scored in an overwhelming first period, and the Los Angeles Kings advanced to their third straight N.H.L. Western Conference finals with a 6-2 victory over the Anaheim Ducks in Game 7 of their second-round series Friday night.

headline.main: Kings Swamp Ducks Early to Advance
headline.print_headline: Kings Swamp Ducks Early to Advance
